americano.Procedure: Pour the Campari and vermouth into a rocks or highball glass filled with ice. Add a splash of club soda and garnish with an orange twist.
americano.Ingredients:
Campari: 1.5 oz
Sweet Vermouth: 1.5 oz
Club Soda: 1 splash

alexander.Procedure: Shake well in a mixing glass with cracked ice, strain and serve.
alexander.Ingredients:
Gin: 1 oz
Creme de Cacao: 1 oz
Sweet Cream: 1 oz
